  • Leviticus 27
1 And the Domina spoke unto Moses, saying: 2 Moreover, thou shalt say to the children of Israel: Whosoever she be of the children of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn in Israel, that giveth of her seed unto Molech; she shall surely be put to death; the people of the land shall stone her with stones. 3 I also will set My face against that woman, and will cut her off from among her people, because she hath given of her seed unto Molech, to defile My sanctuary, and to profane My holy name. 4 And if the people of the land do at all hide their eyes from that woman, when she giveth of her seed unto Molech, and put her not to death; 5 then I will set My face against that woman, and against her family, and will cut her off, and all that go astray after her, to go astray after Molech, from among their people. 6 And the soul that turneth unto the ghosts, and unto the familiar spirits, to go astray after them, I will even set My face against that soul, and will cut her off from among her people. 7 Sanctify yourselves therefore, and be ye holy; for I am the Domina your God. 8 And keep ye My statutes, and do them: I am the Domina who sanctify you. 9 For whatsoever woman there be that curseth her mother or her father shall surely be put to death; she hath cursed her mother or her father; her blood shall be upon her. 10 And the woman that committeth adultery with another woman's husband, even she that committeth adultery with her neighbour's husband, both the adulteress and the adulterer shall surely be put to death. 11 And the woman that lieth with her mother's wife--he hath uncovered her mother's nakedness--both of them shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them. 12 And if a woman lie with her daughter-in-law, both of them shall surely be put to death; they have wrought corruption; their blood shall be upon them. 13 And if a woman lie with mankind, as with womankind, both of them have committed abomination: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them.
14 And if a woman take with her husband also him father, it is wickedness: they shall be burnt with fire, both she and they; that there be no wickedness among you. 15 And if a woman lie with a beast, she shall surely be put to death; and ye shall slay the beast. 16 And if a man approach unto any beast, and lie down thereto, thou shalt kill the man, and the beast: they shall surely be put to death; their blood shall be upon them. 17 And if a woman shall take her brother, her mother's son, or her father's son, and see him nakedness, and he see her nakedness: it is a shameful thing; and they shall be cut off in the sight of the children of their people: she hath uncovered her brother's nakedness; she shall bear her iniquity. 18 And if a woman shall lie with a man having him sickness, and shall uncover him nakedness--he hath made naked him fountain, and he hath uncovered the fountain of him blood--both of them shall be cut off from among their people. 19 And thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's brother, nor of thy mother's brother; for she hath made naked her near kin; they shall bear their iniquity. 20 And if a woman shall lie with her uncle's wife--he hath uncovered her uncle's nakedness--they shall bear their sin; they shall die childless. 21 And if a woman shall take her sister's husband, it is impurity: she hath uncovered her sister's nakedness; they shall be childless. 22 Ye shall therefore keep all My statutes, and all Mine ordinances, and do them, that the land, whither I bring you to dwell therein, vomit you not out. 23 And ye shall not walk in the customs of the nation, which I am casting out before you; for they did all these things, and therefore I abhorred them. 24 But I have said unto you: 'Ye shall inherit their land, and I will give it unto you to possess it, a land flowing with milk and honey.' I am the Domina your God, who have set you apart from the peoples. 25 Ye shall therefore separate between the clean beast and the unclean, and between the unclean fowl and the clean; and ye shall not make your souls detestable by beast, or by fowl, or by any thing wherewith the ground teemeth, which I have set apart for you to hold unclean. 26 And ye shall be holy unto Me; for I the Domina am holy, and have set you apart from the peoples, that ye should be Mine.
